value: hello I am Ahmad.; hi you are my friend.; I am Ali.; you are Omar.; goodbye my friend.; he is my friend.; she is fine now.; he is from Kabul.; she is in the city.; he is in my class.; it is nice to meet you.; we are fine today.; they are from one city.; it is a good day.; we are happy here.; where are you from?; what is your name?; who is that boy?; what city are you in?; where is the country?; I have a book.; you have a pen.; he has a pencil.; she has a bag.; they have a chair.;

this is the table.; that is the board.; is this the door?; yes it is; is that the window?; no it is not.; this is one chair.; these are two tables.; these are three windows.; these are four bags.; these are five pens.; I have a bed.; she has a room.; he has a kitchen.; they have a home.; we have a room.; these are my brothers.; those are my sisters.; those are my brothers.; this is my mother.; this is my father.; this is my red bag.; that is your blue pen.; this is his green chair.; that is her yellow book.; these are my blue pencils.;

there are six cups.; these are seven apples.; there are eight books.; there are nine chairs.; there are ten bags.; I can run.; you can jump.; he can speak.; she can draw.; you can write.; this is my hand.; this is his leg.; this is her head.; this is my eye.; this is her hand.; this is my book.; this is your cup.; this is his apple.; this is her room.; these are my apples.; I like bread.; I like water.; I like rice.; I do not like apples.; I do not like bread.;

I am happy now.; I am sad today.; I am tired now.; are you angry?; are you happy today?; it is morning now.; it is afternoon.; it is night now.; is it morning now?; is it night?; it is hot now.; it is cold now.; it is the sun.; it is not rain.; it is not cold.; sit here now.; stand up now.; come here now.; go to school.; this is a banana.; I have an egg.; is this a school or a park?; is it a shop or a mosque?; I see a school and a park.; go to the shop and the mosque.; there is a park and a mosque.;
